dcterms:description: Dataset containing melting patterns in induction furnaces, used to improve process sustainability and profitability in foundry operations.
dcterms:title: Melting Patterns in Induction Furnaces

dcterms:description: Dataset on energy consumption in foundry production, focusing on improvements in energy efficiency and environmental impact through novel melting processes.
dcterms:title: Energy Consumption in Foundry Production

dcterms:creator: J. Haraldsson
M.T. Johansson
dcterms:description: Dataset detailing energy efficiency practices and barriers in the Swedish aluminium industry and casting foundries.
dcterms:title: Energy Efficiency in the Swedish Aluminium Industry

dcterms:creator: A. Al Skaif
M. Ayache
H. Kanaan
dcterms:description: Dataset on energy consumption patterns in production processes, utilizing machine learning for clustering.
dcterms:title: Energy Consumption Patterns in Production Processes

dcterms:creator: K.Y. Sin
M.S. Jusoh
A. Mardani
dcterms:description: Dataset proposing an integrated multi-criteria decision-making approach to evaluate energy efficiency practices in industrial processes.
dcterms:title: Energy Efficiency Practices in Industrial Processes

dcterms:description: Dataset on a hybrid multi-criteria decision-making model aimed at increasing energy efficiency in vehicle service centers.
